## FieldCheckbox class

Class for a checkbox field.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FieldCheckbox extends Field<CheckboxBool> 
```
**Extends:** [Field](./blockly.field.md)<!-- -->&lt;CheckboxBool&gt;

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [CHECK\_CHAR](./blockly.fieldcheckbox.check_char.md) | <p><code>static</code></p><p><code>readonly</code></p> | (not declared) | Default character for the checkmark. |
|  [SERIALIZABLE](./blockly.fieldcheckbox.serializable.md) |  | boolean | Serializable fields are saved by the serializer, non-serializable fields are not. Editable fields should also be serializable. |
|  [value\_](./blockly.fieldcheckbox.value_.md) |  | boolean \| null | NOTE: The default value is set in <code>Field</code>, so maintain that value instead of overwriting it here or in the constructor. |

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |

|  [getValueBoolean()](./blockly.fieldcheckbox.getvalueboolean.md) |  | Get the boolean value of this field. |
